Luma Education Platform

star star star star star

“ Incredible value for a fraction of what would cost to commission an advanced UI/UX for any modern Education Platform with tools for Enterprise Resource Planning and for Teachers to bring their knowledge online „

— Laza Bogdan @ FrontendMatter

Learning Management System

Luma is a beautifully crafted user interface for modern Education Platforms, including Courses & Tutorials, Video Lessons, Student and Teacher Dashboard, Curriculum Management, Earnings and Reporting, ERP, HR, CMS, Tasks, Projects, eCommerce and more.

App layout

Display a full-width sidebar navigation suitable for authenticated members.

Demo
Guest layout

Display a top main navigation navbar and centered top-to-bottom content flow, suitable for presenting content and landing pages.

Demo
Boxed layout
Demo
Compact layout

Display a smaller-width main sidebar navigation with stacked icons and text and an optional secondary full-width sidebar on demand.

Demo
Sticky layout

Display a full-width sidebar navigation and a sticky top navbar menu.

Demo
Mini secondary layout

Display a secondary full width sidebar menu along-side the main smaller width icon-only sidebar, visible on desktop by default.

Demo
Mini layout

Display a smaller width icon-only sidebar menu as the primary navigation and an optional secondary full-width sidebar menu on demand.

Demo

Luma

Luma is a beautifully crafted user interface for modern Education Platforms, including Courses & Tutorials, Video Lessons, Student and Teacher Dashboard, Curriculum Management, Earnings and Reporting, ERP, HR, CMS, Tasks, Projects, eCommerce and more.
